content.SUBTITLE: You want to raise funds, so story tell your idea!
content.desc_fr: To find Angels ready to invest in your idea, your pitch is a major step. First, we help you to assess if it is time to go pitching. To get ready, we propose collective pitch training session in collaboration with XX, individual coaching and also enablers, Pitch[M}otion or Stor[m]board by Nod-A. To get inspired, we propose a TEDTalks library
content.desc_en: To find Angels ready to invest in your idea, your pitch is a major step. First, we help you to assess if it is time to go pitching. To get ready, we propose collective pitch training session in collaboration with XX, individual coaching and also enablers, Pitch[M}otion or Stor[m]board by Nod-A. To get inspired, we propose a TEDTalks library
